definition: oil spill/oil leak/(fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: An aerial view of the oil leaked from the Deepwater Horizon wellhead.
sentences.chinese: 深水钻油平台漏油的一个鸟瞰画面。

sentences.english: This allows it to draw on resources from across the country.
sentences.chinese: 这使得美国从全国调取物资，来应对这次的漏油事件。

sentences.english: Can view the first round of brake oil pipe is, the adequacy of tire pressure.
sentences.chinese: 可先检视该轮制动管路是否漏油，轮胎气压是否充足。

sentences.english: This sign foretells of oil spills in the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 这一迹象预示漏油的海洋。

sentences.english: Check the L MLG hydraulic tube leakage is out of limits.
sentences.chinese: 检查发现左主起落架一液压管漏油超标。

sentences.english: If dish is very full, put a pan under the dish to catch spills.
sentences.chinese: 如果菜很充分，把碟盘下捕捉漏油。

sentences.english: The mower should be stored upright as tilting the mower may cause oil leaks.
sentences.chinese: 割草机应直立存放，因为倾斜可造成漏油。

sentences.english: A worker paddles his boat as helps clean up an oil spill near Dalian, China.
sentences.chinese: 大连附近一名工人划着他的船并协助清理漏油，中国。

sentences.english: XXX, Ramp Control , there is some fuel slick near stand 3, please handle it.
sentences.chinese: 现场，3号停机位附近有漏油，请处理一下。

sentences.english: The hydraulic switch of skylight found leaking.
sentences.chinese: 天窗的液压开关发现漏油。

sentences.english: When the oil spill happened we wanted to continue that fantastic year, we wanted to continue the momentum.
sentences.chinese: 漏油事件发生时，我们想保持这股气势。

sentences.english: Communities and economies throughout the Gulf were devastated by the spill.
sentences.chinese: 整个湾区的经济与社区受到漏油事件严重的破坏。

sentences.english: A zoologist attempts to capture a northern gannet affected by the oil spill.
sentences.chinese: 一个动物学家企图捕捉沾染漏油的北方塘鹅。

sentences.english: Hydraulic system still leak, we'll be able to manage it to DACCA .
sentences.chinese: 液压系统仍漏油，但能够操纵它到达卡。

sentences.english: Fatigue any part of the pipeline wall thinning oil spills are likely to break.
sentences.chinese: 输油管管壁的任何部位疲劳变薄都有可能断裂漏油。

sentences.english: Hunt's Oyster Bar has been serving oysters non-stop since the oil leak started.
sentences.chinese: 从漏油事件起始，亨特牡蛎酒吧的牡蛎买卖从来停过。
